name: Football Manager Live
description:
Football Manager Live from Sports Interactive, the creators of the hugely popular Football Manager series, is a combination of Fantasy Football, Auction sites, Social Networking and the Football Manager concept all rolled into one.

Create and manage your very own football club — YOU create your team name, colors, badge & home ground and YOU decide which players to sign.

Choose your own dream team — Take your pick from Sports Interactive's world famous database of over 330,000 footballers.

Show the world how good you are — Play against your mates or other managers from around the globe in a gameworld that's LIVE and online 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

Choose from over 10 official associations — Choose the league that suits both your play time and style and work your way to the top.

Manage matches live — If a game's not going your way, change tactics on-the-fly from the virtual dugout. Will YOU take the glory?

Wheel and deal on the transfer market — Buy, sell, loan and exchange players in the lively transfer market, or snap up some talent with the exciting new auction system.

Develop your club — Use the innovative skill system to develop and improve your managerial style; unlock bonuses that will give you the edge.
